about_the_game:
Welcome to the Slums of New Mumbai!

Divided Skies is a single player flight adventure game where you play as Kyra, a member of the Nandaka gang, as she completes dangerous missions transporting illegal tech and mechanical enhancements while fighting off rival gangs. Shoot enemies, chase down foes, and explore hidden areas as you uncover the secrets of the metropolis called New Mumbai taking place in the year 2100

Features:


  • Satistying VTOL flight movement: Experience the thrill of fast and easy-to-control VTOL flight movement as you speed through the vibrant slums of New Mumbai on Kyra's Hoverbike.
  • Clear missions and progress the story: As you play the game your main objective will be to clear various objectives to progress through the story uncovering more secrets of New Mumbai and Kyra!
  • Engaging combat encounters: Take down enemies in your way as you progress through the story, with exciting and varied combat encounters that challenge your skills as Kyra.
  • Open to explore environment: Explore the vibrant and sprawling slums of New Mumbai at your leisure, with a beautifully crafted open-world environment
  • Dynamic traffic: Experience dynamic traffic as you fly through the slums, being careful not to harm innocent civilians.

detailed_description:
Student Project

Divided Skies is a university project made by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences and is currently no longer in development. However we still have a community discord where you can join and chat with the devs!


Join our Discord


Join our community Discord server to connect with the game's developers and fellow players! Share your feedback and suggestions, and be a part of the development process as we work to make improve our game for our full release!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core
